org.cripac.isee.vpe.ctrl

Class TaskData.ExecutionPlan.MutableNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cripac.isee.vpe.ctrl.TaskData.ExecutionPlan.Node
      • org.cripac.isee.vpe.ctrl.TaskData.ExecutionPlan.MutableNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Enclosing class:
    TaskData.ExecutionPlan

    public class TaskData.ExecutionPlan.MutableNode
extends TaskData.ExecutionPlan.Node
    Each node represents an execution of a module.
    Author:
    Ken Yu, CRIPAC, 2016
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MutableNode()
      Create an empty node for saving memory.
      MutableNode(Topic topic)
      Create a node specifying only the input topic of the module to be executed in the node.
      MutableNode(Topic topic, java.io.Serializable execData)
      Create a node specifying the input topic of the module to be executed in the node and the data for execution.
